data.text:
💜 Autumn University for Gender Equality!

The EFA Women’s Forum and @NuevaCanariasBC are organising a two-day training session in Gran Canaria to strengthen women’s political leadership.

🔗 More information and registrations here: https://t.co/jvHEnrCPzg https://t.co/5XbUftQuIz

📢 CALL FOR TENDERS! Deadline extended until December 9!  

EFA is seeking to engage in a long-term partnership for Audit, Tax and Consulting Services to support the organization’s operational activities.  💼

🔗Apply here: https://t.co/i6dQACNY78 https://t.co/9PxIMKSQFg

💜 Is gender-based violence still a problem in Europe in 2025? Of course, it is!

While some try to undermine feminism and the impact of gender-based violence, we raise our voices louder than ever! 

✊ It’s time to end gender-based violence! https://t.co/hhqy6llgy0

🇧🇬 Bulgaria has failed to implement the @ECHR_CEDH decisions regarding Macedonian minority rights.

To maintain its credibility, the @coe must continue to closely monitor Bulgaria until it complies with the European Convention on Human Rights.🔎

🔗 https://t.co/AfUVEQrxdL https://t.co/O7n5PDhV2m

📢 CALL FOR TENDERS! Deadline extended!  

EFA is seeking to engage in a long-term partnership for Interpretation Services. 🗣️

To help applicants draft the proposal, we included four different scenarios in the annex to the tender details.

🔗 Apply here: https://t.co/i6dQACNY78 https://t.co/ujIsDjUB88

📢 INTERVIEW

🇪🇺🗣️ EFA Secretary General Oriol Cases: "The far right is the Trojan horse that wants to bring down the European project". 

🔗Full interview [in Catalan, with translation tool available]: 
https://t.co/8z26oI98xC

📢 CALL FOR TENDERS! Deadline extended!  

💼 EFA is seeking to engage in a long-term partnership for Audit, Tax and Consulting Services to support the organization’s operational activities. 

🔗https://t.co/i6dQACNY78 https://t.co/1HXVx3Nia8

The CJEU’s Advocate General endorses the amnesty granted to Catalan independence leaders. A step forward for justice! ✊

Once again, justice reminds us that defending the right to self-determination is defending freedom and democracy!

🔗 https://t.co/UWweKjsFWQ

🇪🇭 50 years after Morocco’s illegal occupation of Western Sahara, we raise our voices for self-determination!
The @UN is considering Morocco's autonomy plan, which denies sovereignty to SADR. After so many years of violation of human rights, Sahrawis cannot give up on nationhood! https://t.co/OdqwtI2GMP

EFA stands for ending #geoblocking for audiovisual content 🎬

MEP @DianaRibaGiner has long fought for equal access to culture across all European languages. At the @FUEN_Info Congress, EFA VP Anke Spoorendonk from the SSW reinforced this call!

It’s time to reopen the debate! https://t.co/NUY4E2iTTD
